pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieving Soil Data from POLARIS // The POLARIS database http://hydrology.cee.duke.edu/POLARIS/ is a 30-meter probabilistic soil series map of the contiguous United States (US). It represents an optimization of the Soil Survey Geographic database. This R package facilitates the access to large amounts of soil data within the US, currently stored online as raster images (TIFF).
